main event: A witness observed a bright object moving at high speed, drifting off course with hovering and changes in direction, in St. Louis on May 30, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 12 minutes,The object was reported as large and moved from East to West,The object exhibited hovering behavior and speed variations,The report is part of the Project Blue Book files,The witness's sighting occurred at night under clear skies.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
